channel.title: Drop Rate Changing
channel.description:
I have a Project Insanity source, and I want General Graardor to drop some decent items, and also Bgs/Bcp/Tassets/ but I don't know how to set the Quantity or the Rarity, Help?
[code] #general graardor 1079:1 1127:1 4835:10 1150:1 452:10 1514:10 13770:1 11710:1 11712:1 11714:1 11724:1 11726:1 11728:1 11696:1 [/code]
I want the top row to drop commonly, and the bottom row to be a 25 kill drop rate, what do I change?
Thanks. :)

item.title: Drop Rate Changing
